name: .ACCDW File Extension
summary: Learn about .ACCDW files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Link file used by Microsoft Access, a relational database program for desktop computers; contains link information for downloading an Access database file (.ACCDB file) from a Microsoft SharePoint server; enables users to share database files that are hosted remotely.

content: After an ACCDW file is opened, the target ACCDB file is automatically downloaded to a local copy on the user's computer.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
